title: Jigoku e Michizure
sinopse:
A fledgling magician attempts to summon a demonic familiar. What he gets is a sultry, slutty, poncy imp.

1. Travelling Companion to Hell

2. Sweet Unholy

3. Glory of Corruption

4. Love and Hypnotism

5. My Alice

6. Love From the Bath House

7. I Was Made For

8. Equinoctial Week's Lover

9. To The Endearing You

(from B-U)
